tool_description: An API for showing all the latest climate chage news around the US and UK
name: ClimateChangeInfo
title: ClimateChangeInfo

api_list.name: individual news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangeinfo.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangeinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechangeinfo.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechangeinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get ALL Climate change news
api_list.description: this endpoint will return all news about climate change from word
